on reading compounds: 秘密【ヒミツ】secret, secrecy, confidentiality, privacy, mystery, secret (e.g. to success), esoteric teachings
秘書【ヒショ】(private) secretary, treasured book, secret book
部外秘【ブガイヒ】restricted to the department
社外秘【シャガイヒ】company secret
kun reading compounds: 秘める【ひめる】to hide, to keep to oneself
